channel.title: Changing npc death timer for 1 npc
channel.description: Was wondering if anyone knew how to change the death timer for a certain npc for my recipe for disaster minigame. I use the summonnewnpc method and I don't want the first monster to spawn so quickly. Anyone have a code that works that'll make an npc spawn timer longer than the rest?

item.title: Changing npc death timer for 1 npc
